title: Matters not to be evidence in civil court
context: §287-14 Matters not to be evidence in civil court. Neither the report required by section 287-4, the action taken by the administrator pursuant to this chapter, the findings of the administrator upon which the action is based, nor the security filed as provided in this chapter shall be referred to in any way or be any evidence of the negligence or due care of either party at the trial of any action to recover damages. [L 1949, c 393, pt of §1; RL 1955, §160-92; HRS §287-14; am L 1980, c 84, pt of §1]
